# Software Version

* **OS**: *`r system("lsb_release -sd", intern=TRUE)`*
* **Python**: *`r system('~/envs/data/bin/python -c "import sys; print(sys.version)"', intern=TRUE)`*
* **PostgreSQL**: *`r dbGetQuery(con, "select version()")[1]$version`*
* **R**: *`r version`*
